title: after referred to as 'IH tenements') and shall be constructed at least to the extent of 20% of the Zonal(basic) FSI
clause_text: after referred to as 'IH tenements') and shall be constructed at least to the extent of 20% of the Zonal(basic) FSI. Such housing shall preferably be in separate wing/building and shall be handed over to MCGM subject to the following conditions: -
